channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Karine Jean-Pierre faces press grilling after Biden pardons son Hunter
item.description: Reporters grilled White House press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre on Monday, after President Biden went back on his word and pardoned his son Hunter.

item.title: Speaker: Hunter Biden's Pardon 'Abuse' of Justice System
item.description: President Joe Biden's pardon of son Hunter Biden is an "abuse" of the justice system, House Speaker Mike Johnson said.

item.title: 'It's a setback': Democrats criticize Biden over Hunter pardon
item.description: Democrats are signaling they are uneasy with President Biden's decision to grant a sweeping pardon for his son.

item.title: Corey Lewandowski to Newsmax: Biden 'Lied to the American People'
item.description: Corey Lewandowski, senior adviser to President-elect Donald Trump, told Newsmax on Monday that it's "not surprising" President Joe Biden issued a pard...

item.title: Biden Condemns Hamas' Killing of US-Israeli Soldier
item.description: President Joe Biden condemned the murder by Hamas of an American/Israeli soldier during the terrorists' Oct. 7, 2023, massacre in Israel.

item.title: Trump previously predicted Biden would pardon son Hunter
item.description: President-elect Trump predicted to Fox News in October that President Biden would pardon his son Hunter Biden.

item.title: Thomas Massie, conservative commentators vocally oppose Trump's DEA nominee
